question: There are 129 fifth-graders at Maple Grove School. 74 of them are girls. On Thursday, 6 fifth-grade girls and 9 fifth-grade boys were absent. How many fifth grade boys were at Maple Grove School on Thursday?
answer:
Of the 129 fifth graders, 74 are girls, so 129 students - 74 girls = <<129-74=55>>55 boys.
On Thursday there were 55 boys - 9 absent = <<55-9=46>>46 boys.
#### 46
